title: Pessat counselling 1
content: Just in case you are intrestested

comments.body: Pes ec campus cse worth it ??
yup
your pessat rank??
Will I get ece at RR CAMPUS at 280X rank in second round? I couldn't go for round one counseling due to some issues?

you'll def get ece at rr campus .....well you might get cse at ec campus

even I'm confused whether I'll get cse at ec campus or not ( pessat rank - 2313 )

Let's hope for the best and all the best to you mate!
Thanks mate for the relief, i believe you will get cse at ec campus easily, have trust also best of luck for ur college life:)

hey so according to [this link](https://www.getmyuni.com/exams/pessat-cut-off), the PESSAT cutoff for EEE last year was 8.2k, and my rank this year was 6.9k. do you think i have a shot at landing EEE in round 2? :P

Give me also some hope my man

Rank 32xx

Will I get ECE in 2nd round RR

Use this instead of other websites 


This was last year's cutoff

last year ECE rr campus closing rank - 2977 ( round 1 )  &  3693 ( round 2 )

imo you'll get ECE at rr campus

hope for the best mate ;)

Will I get eee at rank of 61xx in second coounselling.
I got mechanical in the first round but differred it
Totally. The placements office is the same for both and the teaching is good too

hey guys i didnt sit in round 1 of counselling because u got 6k rank in comedk and thought that i would get any circuital branch in top 3 colleges atleast. but the cutoff turns out to be too high. i got a rank of 1.8k  in pessat and i am interest in circuital branches. Is ece or eee worth it from pes considering i didnt get any circuital branch in top 3 from comedk

Thank you.
Just wanted to ask that being a north indian will I face any issues over there ?
Damn dude opening rank 1 I remember last year topper of pessat got like rank 10 in jee adv
U will get cs in ec campus its good better than ece in others
Getting adjusted to the food might be hard , other than that , no issues. There are a lot of North Indians in PES
i dont want cse. is ece good in rr campus>?
you may get aiml at rr campus
